page.title: 13HOTELS(2)
page.content: {Hotel Metropole,}Llandrindod Wells. One of Mid-Wales' finest hotels offering very modern comfort,with good food and wines.Exellent conference and banquet rooms. {Mostyn Hotel,}Temple Street, Llandrindod Wells.Family run with exellent home cooked food.Centrally situated.Small meeting facilities. The hotels in the town provide a great deal of employment especially during the very busy summer season when a large number of tourists are attracted to the town. The Commodore,Glen-Usk and the Metropole are three of the most dominating buildings in the town.
